Title: Workshop with Vania
desc: We all know 3D printing is the future of technology. This workshop is a head-start for anyone willing to stay ahead. You’ll learn about 3D printing in details through interactive sessions with Vania, and our expert.

Title: Maths for Everyone
desc: Taking the first step towards equal access to quality education. These workshops are organised by our experts for all who are williing to learn.

Title: ChessCon
desc: Pattern recognition and logic are two of the most important elements in our day to day life .What’s better way to master them than playing chess?
